content.query:
SELECT distinct expected_from FROM [odw_standardised_db].[dbo].[hr_absences]
order by expected_from DESC

DECLARE @ComparisonDate DATE
SET @ComparisonDate = '2022-05-01'
SELECT TOP 1 *
FROM [odw_standardised_db].[dbo].[hr_absences] as absences
WHERE absences.expected_from < @ComparisonDate
ORDER BY absences.expected_from DESC

DECLARE @ComparisonDate DATE
SET @ComparisonDate = '2022-05-01'
SELECT distinct expected_from
FROM [odw_standardised_db].[dbo].[hr_absences] as absences
WHERE absences.expected_from < @ComparisonDate
ORDER BY absences.expected_from DESC
